Taylor Brown

I'm Taylor.

I'm from Kansas. I live in Chicago.

I live a double life.

Work

I'm an SEO Specialist for Tribune Publishing. I manage SEO (Search Engine Optimization) for publications, including the Chicago Tribune and L.A. Times.

Not-Work

I'm an improviser. I've studied at The Second City, iO, The Annoyance and I play on independent teams. I make short comedy videos for the internet.
